about.title: About Broccoli Studios
about.description: Founded in Costa Rica, Broccoli Studios emerged from a simple observation: most businesses operate with fragmented systems, disconnected data, and experiences that don't compound.
about.paragraph1: We build differently. Every system we design connects to a larger whole. Every platform we develop creates ownership and control. Every data point we capture feeds into smarter decisions.
about.paragraph2: Our team combines deep technical expertise with strategic thinking, allowing us to operate at the intersection of business architecture and technology implementation.
